agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of funding for acquisition
agenda_items.description: Review and consideration of an amount not to exceed $1,829,328.00 from the Mall Area Redevelopment TIF District Fund, to be leveraged by $9,480,672.00 from the 2024 Bond Fund for the proposed acquisition.

agenda_items.action_required: Approval and forward a recommendation of approval to City Council
